The Tipdigest.com extension replaces your New Tab Search Engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Here's how you can access this functionality:
Install the extension and search using the New Tab Search Bar!

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the TipDigest extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Please read carefully: By installing this application, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 

Privacy Policy: https://blendernetworks.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://tipdigest.com/terms-of-use/
